title: Behind The Idea #18: How Delta Is Gaining Ground With Paul Brady
description:
Conde Nast Traveler Articles Editor Paul Brady joins Behind The Idea this week to follow up on our Delta discussion (episode #15). We discuss the state of the industry and the limits on capacity, and how Delta is trying to gain distance from its competitors.
Topics covered:

2:00 minute mark - Delta’s focus cities and offering full scheduling options
5:25 - Capacity constraints and where that leaves fliers and airlines
9:25 - What are the risks and drawbacks to being at full capacity?
14:25 - What is Delt
